## Interaction commands

- **mv** - move a file

```
mv <name of the file> <name of the “copy”>
```
```
mv ../copied_file .
```
![](img/dir_struct_after.PNG){width=400}
![](img/mv.PNG){width=400}
<br>
Notice! the . denotes the current location


## Interaction commands

- **mv** - rename a file

```
mv <name of the file> <name of the “copy”>
```
```
mv copied_file my_renamed_file
```
![](img/mv2.PNG){width=400}

## Interaction commands

## Interaction commands

- \* - wildcards
  - Works on most linux commands

```
ls -l *.txt
```
![](img/wildcard.PNG){width=400}

## Interaction commands

- \* - wildcards
  - Works on most linux commands

```
cp *.txt myfolder/
rm *.txt
```
